answerText: Magnetic Pole Reversal [Or Geomagnetic Reversal][10] This triply eponymous hypothesis predicted that the Magnetic pole reversals would leave symmetric traces in rocks that were forming in Mid Ocean Ridges.

question: Question: An Asymmetric Saw tooth pattern in observed in the graph tracking these events and similarly named "excursions," FTPE, Name: [10] These events, the most recent of which, at about 1.2 million years ago, saw a transition from the Matuyama to the Brunhes Chron. These events have been hypothesized to be the cause of several mass extinctions.
